Description: Previously Loved and cared for... Excellent Condition ( some would call mint ) Carvin AE185 (AE-185) Semi-Hollow Acoustic / Electric Guitar. Classic Sunburst on Flamed Maple with one f hole. Body binding, phase/coil switches accented by gold hardware. Mother of pearl block inlays. This listing includes a hardshell Carver case. The AE185 allows you to jump from electric lead riffs to acoustic tone easily which is basically two instruments in one. Versatile and Gorgeous! FYI- I am not a guitar player nor musician.
